subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Broncos have continued their winning ways and their blue-collar identity since Chris Petersen left to lead Washington, which lost to Boise State,16-13, in Friday night’s season opener.
snippet: The Broncos have continued their winning ways and their blue-collar identity since Chris Petersen left to lead Washington, which lost to Boise State,16-13, in Friday night’s season opener.
